sentences.en: an acoustic/an electric/a classical, etc. guitar
sentences.cn: 原声吉他、电吉他、古典吉他等

sentences.en: Before singing, he noodled at his guitar.
sentences.cn: 唱歌之前他先弹了几下吉他。

sentences.en: Bronka is somewhat infamous for his screeching electric guitar work.
sentences.cn: 布朗卡因为弹出刺耳的电吉他声而有些让人讨厌。

sentences.en: Duffy's primitive guitar playing is well below par.
sentences.cn: 达菲粗糙的吉他演奏技巧远不够水平。

sentences.en: He began performing in the early fifties, singing and playing guitar.
sentences.cn: 他从50年代早期开始表演吉他弹唱。
他弹了一会儿哇哇吉他。

sentences.en: He spent his adolescent years playing guitar in the church band.
sentences.cn: 他在教堂的乐队里弹吉他，度过了他的青少年时期。

sentences.en: He strummed his guitar when he talked to me.
sentences.cn: 他和我说话时把吉他拨弄响了。

sentences.en: Her hobbies were playing the guitar and sketching.
sentences.cn: 她爱好弹吉他和画素描。

sentences.en: His guitar solos are just unbelievable.
Molly had cringed when Ann started picking up the guitar.
sentences.cn: 安开始弹吉他时，莫莉感到有些难堪。

sentences.en: Richey's not miming, he's playing very quiet guitar.
sentences.cn: 里奇并非在摆样子，只是他的吉他弹得声音很小罢了。

sentences.en: She smiled her thanks and arranged the guitar under her arm.
sentences.cn: 她微笑着致了谢，把胳膊下面的吉他调整了一下。

sentences.en: She was backed by acoustic guitar, bass and congas.
sentences.cn: 原声吉他、贝斯和康茄鼓为她伴奏。

sentences.en: She was trying to teach him to play the guitar.
There's some nifty guitar work on his latest CD.
sentences.cn: 他最新的激光唱片里有一些吉他曲弹得非常精彩。

sentences.en: Vaska strummed away on his guitar.
sentences.cn: 瓦斯卡弹拨着自己的吉他。

phrases.tran_cn: （伴随节拍弹奏的想像中的）空气吉他；幻想吉他

trans.tran_en: a musical instrument usually with six strings that you play by pulling the strings with your fingers or with a  plectrum (= small piece of plastic, metal etc )
